drupalNodeEvent.title: Kingdom of Characters: The Language Evolution That Made China Modern by Jing Tsu

field_description.processed: For our March book club we’re reading Kingdom of Characters in preparation for our chat with the author, Jing Tsu. --- After a meteoric rise, China today is one of the world’s most powerful nations. Just a century ago, it was a crumbling empire with literacy reserved for the elite few, as the world underwent a massive technological transformation that threatened to leave them behind. In Kingdom of Characters, Jing Tsu argues that China’s most daunting challenge was a linguistic one: the century-long fight to make the formidable Chinese language accessible to the modern world of global trade and digital technology.
